overview:
Founder and CEO, Musikki

Has a degree in New Communication Technologies and a Master in Multimedia Communication, both from the University of Aveiro. He is passionate about music and technology, passions that have followed him ever since. While studying, he worked at EMI - Valentim de Carvalho and co-founded wahWah, an independent music store. In recent years, worked as a researcher at the University of Aveiro and Portugal Telecom.

At one point, sought to guide his professional career to do what he really loves: create new concepts. This conviction led him to implement some of his ideas. Among them is Musikki, a music search engine that recently won the ISCTE-IUL MIT Venture Competition, having risen â‚¬200K in financial support.
